thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: 2U Inc Q1 Loss Per Share $0.28

author: Reuters Editorial
title: 2U Inc Q1 Loss Per Share $0.28
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - 2U Inc:
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 42 PERCENT TO $92.3 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.13, REVENUE VIEW $91.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2Q 2018 ADJUSTED NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.22 - $0.21
* SEES 2Q 2018 REVENUE $95.1 MILLION - $96.1 MILLION
* SEES 2Q 2018 NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.42 - $0.41
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 - $0.10
* SEES FY 2018 NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.87 - $0.84
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $406.6 MILLION - $410.6 MILLION
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.19, REVENUE VIEW $93.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.12, REVENUE VIEW $401.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text ( bit.ly/2JTleLw )
